Container.Name: Mousehole
Container.Overview: Mousehole is a lightweight web application for managing and tracking mouse activity or similar monitoring tasks. This container provides a simple web interface accessible via port 5010.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the Mousehole web interface

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Timezone for localization of API times (e.g., America/New_York, Europe/London)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Directory to persist cookie data and application state
